DataElement.preferredName: BREAST-Q Reconstruction Past Week Satisfaction with Amount of Rippling of Your Implants That You Can See Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation in the past week about how satisfied or dissatisfied they have been with the amount of rippling (wrinkling) of their implant(s) that they can see, using a 4 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: BREAST-Q Mammoplasty Past Week Satisfaction with Amount of Rippling of Your Implants That You Can See Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A patient-reported outcome measure designed to provide information about the impact and effectiveness of breast surgery. It consists of 5 modules: augmentation, reduction (or mastopexy), breast conserving therapy, mastectomy, and post-mastectomy reconstruction. Each module is divided into multiple scales that can be used independently._Surgical reconstruction of the breast._The most recent week, including today._A question about how satisfied or dissatisfied an individual is or was with the amount of rippling or wrinkling of their implants that they can see._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A patient-reported outcome measure designed to provide information about the impact and effectiveness of breast surgery. It consists of 5 modules: augmentation, reduction (or mastopexy), breast conserving therapy, mastectomy, and post-mastectomy reconstruction. Each module is divided into multiple scales that can be used independently.

Concepts.definition: A patient-reported outcome measure designed to provide information about the impact and effectiveness of breast surgery. It consists of 5 modules: augmentation, reduction (or mastopexy), breast conserving therapy, mastectomy, and post-mastectomy reconstruction. Each module is divided into multiple scales that can be used independently.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: Satisfaction with Amount of Rippling of Your Implants That You Can See
Concepts.definition: A question about how satisfied or dissatisfied an individual is or was with the amount of rippling or wrinkling of their implants that they can see.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
